dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to tread into the domain of Gorath, the Tentacle Ooze! What pitiful creature seeks an audience with me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am no pitiful creature. I am Zarathos, the Shadow Conqueror, and I seek the dark artifacts that lie within this forest.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, another power-hungry fool. You think you can outwit the shadows, but you underestimate the darkness that dwells here. What makes you think you are worthy of such artifacts?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My power is unmatched, and the shadows bow to me. I will take what I desire, no matter the cost.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for one who stumbles blindly into the abyss. Your arrogance will be your downfall. Prepare to face the consequences of your folly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate me. I fear no creature, not even the likes of you. Face me in battle, if you dare!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hahaha! Your bravado is amusing. Very well, let us see if your actions match your words. Prepare to feel the wrath of Gorath, the Tentacle Ooze!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your power, Gorath. Perhaps we can aid each other in our quests. Join me, and together we can conquer this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A feeble attempt at manipulation. I have no need for alliances with weaklings. Begone, before I decide to crush you where you stand.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to exchange words. Show me where the artifacts are, or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impudence! You dare to make demands in my domain? Such arrogance will be met with swift punishment. Prepare yourself for the wrath of Gorath, the Tentacle Ooze!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power beyond your understanding. Stand aside, and I may spare your wretched existence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power beyond my understanding? You are nothing but a deluded fool. Your threats amuse me. Let us see if you can back them up with action.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am but a traveler in need of guidance. Can you help me navigate these dark forests and avoid any dangers that may lurk within?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Guidance? Hah! Do I look like a mere tour guide to you? The shadows here consume all who are foolish enough to wander blindly. You are on your own, weakling.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your hostility, but I offer you a chance to avoid needless conflict. Aid me, and I will ensure you are rewarded handsomely.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Reward? Your words hold no sway over me. I care not for your trinkets or promises. Begone, before I decide to crush you for your insolence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your refusal is noted. Allow me to pass peacefully, or face the consequences of obstructing my path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You threaten me? Ha! Your bravado is laughable. Step lightly, fool, or you may find yourself at the mercy of the shadows you so carelessly provoke.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see diplomacy is wasted on you. Very well, I shall find my own way. May our paths never cross again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May our paths never cross again, indeed. Your departure brings me no sorrow. Begone, and trouble me no more with your presence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking no quarrel. I merely wish to pass through this forest unharmed. Will you allow me safe passage?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? You speak of peace in a realm where darkness reigns supreme? Your naivety is astounding. Safe passage is a luxury you shall not find here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no trouble, only passage. Let us part ways amicably, and no harm shall come to either of us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Amicable parting? Ha! Your words are empty promises in a land where deceit thrives. Be gone, before I decide to teach you a lesson in reality.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your hostility is unwarranted. I offer you a chance for peace. Will you stand down and let me pass unchallenged?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? There is no peace in the shadows, only darkness and despair. I will not yield to your pitiful attempts at diplomacy. Prepare for the consequences of your intrusion.
